import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect'; import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component'; import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const checkoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
Plz use one of these test cards
https://stripe.com/docs/testing#cards

) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(checkoutPage);
